articles.title: Tesla launches unit in Bengaluru, names 3 directors ahead of India launch - Moneycontrol.com
articles.description: Elon Musk's Tesla incorporated its Indian subsidiary Tesla India Motors and Energy Private Ltd in Bengaluru on January 8. Vaibhav Taneja, Venkatrangam Sreeram, and David Jon Feinstein are directors of the new entity.
